title: Sam Raimi’s Abandoned ‘Evil Dead 4′ Plot Sounds Brilliantly Bonkers
text:
Sam Raimi’s Abandoned ‘Evil Dead 4′ Plot Sounds Brilliantly Bonkers 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
With Ash vs. Evil Dead set to arrive Starz this Halloween, the chances of a proper Evil Dead 4 just dwindled to near zero. After all, surel...
